Privacy.cookie_policy_information: When you visit or use this website, Information will be immediately collected via cookies and other tracking technologies. In order to identify or store information in your browser to function properly and optimally. Therefore, cookies are very necessary for the website. We are therefore unable to provide this setting to ensure the website continues to function properly.

About.about_me_subject: Want to know more about Maseshi? This may help you.
About.difficult: To get to this point Is it difficult?
About.difficult_description: I think it's not that difficult. You just need a little dedication and don't get discouraged easily. But getting started is always difficult. Because no one can be born and write code immediately. So if we're really interested, I recommend starting today.
About.personal_subject: personal information about me from time to time
About.why: Why did you enter this industry?
About.why_description: What attracted me to this industry came from my curiosity. Want to know how it works inside your computer? Where did you start and how did you get it? I thought until I wanted to study computer science. It made me especially interested in it and it led to many projects that I see now.

Home.website_description: Learning and development is just as important as practicing programming and building on it. On this website I will present all of what I will offer
Home.website_subject: Maseshi's personal website that houses all his projects.

Other.github_description: Unfinished project. in the development Documents for each project details about that project All projects are included here!!

Other.support_modal_description: Every penny of yours helps me to keep doing other projects.
Other.support_modal_tank_you: Thank you in advance for your continued support
Other.support_thank_you: ❤ Thank you in advance for your continued support

GetStarted.compute_description: This model can be loaded on the Inference API on-demand.
GetStarted.compute_info_load_very_long: I pressed compute but it took too long to load?
GetStarted.compute_info_load_very_long_answer: There are two possibilities: the model may be downloading or the system may use the CPU for computation.
GetStarted.compute_info_why_is_black_image_answer: The system may detect sensitive areas. So you get a black image instead.
